remarks: The base of an explicitly given group.  Note:  This theorem has hard-coded structure indices for demonstration purposes.  It is not intended for general use; use ~ grpbase instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2012.)
statement:
grpstrx.b $e |- B e. _V $.
grpstrx.p $e |- .+ e. _V $.
grpstrx.g $e |- G = { <. 1 , B >. , <. 2 , .+ >. } $.
grpbasex $p |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
